wikipedia_page.main: Glendon Howard Cohen (born 22 April 1954) is a male retired Jamaican-born British track and field athlete who competed in the sprints.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1976 Summer Olympics
response: * Ainsley Bennett, Glen Cohen, David Jenkins, and Alan Pascoe

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1980 Summer Olympics
response: * Alan Bell, Terry Whitehead, Rod Milne, and Glen Cohen

His dad Glen Cohen ran 400m for Great Britain and went to two Olympic Games; Gary's mother, Eleanor Thomas, ran 100m also represented Great Britain. He is the nephew of Shirley Thomas who ran 100m for Great Britain at the Olympic Games.
